title: Divisors of factorial (extreme)
text:
Find the number of divisors ofN! (factorial) very fast !InputThe first line contains an integerT, the number of test cases.Each line of the nextTlines contains two integersNandM.OutputFor each line, output a single line containing the number of divisors ofN! moduloM.ExampleInput3
10 989
10000 999989
10000000000 999999999989Output270
616797
40946947081Constraints1 ≤T≤ 1040 ≤N≤ 10111 ≤M≤ 1012InformationThere are 5 input files.- Input #1:T≤ 104,N≤ 104, TL = 1s- Input #2:T≤ 5,N≤ 108, TL = 20s- Input #3:T≤ 5,N≤ 109, TL = 20s- Input #4:T≤ 5,N≤ 1010, TL = 20s- Input #5:T≤ 5,N≤ 1011, TL = 20sMy total running time is 3.14 sec. (C++)Creditsivar.raknahs- the original problem (DIVFACT) authorFrancky- the author ofDIVFACT2andDIVFACT3
